Package io.helidon.common

Class SpiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.common.SpiHelper

  • public final class SpiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods to help with loading of java services (mostly SPI related).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods

      static <T> T loadSpi​(java.lang.Class<T> service)

      Use direct access to ServiceLoader or have such a helper in your module, as from jigsaw this is not allowed

    • Method Detail

      • loadSpi

        @Deprecated
public static <T> T loadSpi​(java.lang.Class<T> service)
        Deprecated. Use direct access to ServiceLoader or have such a helper in your module, as from jigsaw this is not allowed
        Loads the first service implementation or throw an exception if nothing found.
        Type Parameters:
        T - service type
        Parameters:
        service - the service class to load
        Returns:
        the loaded service
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if none implementation found
